import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Field, withFormik } from 'formik' import * as Yup from 'yup' import axios from 'axios' function AppForm({ values }) { return (
) } const FormikApp = withFormik({ mapPropsToValues({ name, email, password, terms }) { return { name: name || '', email: email || '', password: password || '', terms: terms || false } }, validationSchema: Yup.object().shape({ name: Yup.string() .name() .required(), email: Yup.string() .email() .required(), password: Yup.string() .min(6) .required(), terms: Yup.string() .terms() .required() }), handleSubmit(values) { console.log(values) } }) const MikFor = FormikApp(AppForm) export default MikFor
